mean_cn: n. 壁画；壁画法；  v. 在……上做壁画
mean_en: a picture that is painted on a wall while the plaster is still wet; the method of painting in this way
sentence: We can see the lives of the people of Pompeii from this fresco painting.
sentence_trans: 从这幅壁画中我们得以看见庞贝古城人民的生活场景。
word_etyma: fres=fresh新鲜 ＋ co——用新鲜颜料画的画 → fresco壁画
